trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Ora tu pote seliger de filtrar malware, avisos publicitari, e traciatores de avisos publicitari, lo que te da plus protection quando tu naviga per le web. Trova iste functiones in “Functiones de confidentialitate” in le menu Parametros.
trans-unit.source: You can now choose to filter out malware, ads, and ad trackers, giving you more protection as you navigate the web. Find these features in “Privacy features” within the Settings menu.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Quando tu primo lancea le app illo automaticamente suggerera le position de servitor plus proxime a te.
trans-unit.source: When you first launch the app, the app will now automatically suggest the server location that is closest to you.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Nos ha reorganisate le optiones in le menu Parametros pro adjutar te a trovar importante functiones del app, como Functiones de confidentialitate, e Functionalitate de exclusiones de app.
trans-unit.source: We’ve reorganized the options in the Settings menu to help you find important features of the app, like Privacy features, as well as App exclusions functionality.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Nos ha alsi facite correctiones de defectos, adjustamentos del interfacie de usator e altere meliorationes del prestation, pro render Mozilla VPN mesmo melior.
trans-unit.source: We’ve also made bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements to make Mozilla VPN even better.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Gratias pro installar le ultime version de Mozilla VPN!
trans-unit.source: Thank you for installing the latest version of Mozilla VPN!

trans-unit.target: Tu usa le ultime version de Mozilla VPN. Perspice le ultime functionalitates e actualisationes:
trans-unit.source: You’re using the latest version of Mozilla VPN. Take a look at the newest features and updates:
